name: Torch Bearer
text: You can make use of a torch as a deadly, macelike weapon.
benefit: You treat a torch as a light weapon that deals bludgeoning damage equal to that of a light mace of its size plus 1 point of fire damage, and you do not incur penalties as you would for using it as an improvised weapon.
normal: A torch used in combat is treated as a one-handed improvised weapon that deals bludgeoning damage equal to that of a gauntlet of its size plus 1 point of fire damage.
staminaText: By spending 2 stamina points when you hit an opponent with a torch, you can increase the amount of fire damage dealt by the torch to 1d4.
benefit_zh: 你可以将一支火把当做一支造成钝击伤害的轻型武器来使用，在数据上等同于一支符合你体型，并且在攻击时造成1点额外火焰伤害的轻型硬头锤，你不必承受使用临时武器导致的攻击减值。
normal_zh: 你只能将火把当做单手临时武器来使用，数据上等同于符合你体型的铁手套，并且造成1点额外的火焰伤害。
staminaText_zh: 通过消耗2点耐力，当你使用火炬命中一名敌人时，你可以提升由火炬造成的火焰伤害至1d4点。
